channel.title: koRpus.lang.nl
channel.description: Adds support for the Dutch language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<https://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.1-5
item.description:
changed

  • removed hard coded abbreviations from global TT.tknz.opts in preset, to enable checks for file names by koRpus

  • version number shortened by dropping a zero

  • updated README.md

  • removed methods from list of imported packages

  • renamed abbreviations and parameter files omitting the "-utf8" suffix

added

  • support optional arguments for koRpus::set.lang.support()

  • LICENSE file

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-4
item.description:
changed

  • adjusted koRpus dependency to >= 0.11-1

  • package was moved to the l10n repository on github

removed

  • hyphenation patterns: are now imported via the sylly.pt package

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-3
item.description:
changed

  • renamed preset from "nl-utf8" into plain "nl" , as UTF-8 is the default in both TreeTagger and koRpus

added

  • README.md file

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-2
item.description:
fixed

  • adjusted koRpus dependency to >= 0.06-3

  • typo in package description

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-1
item.description:
changed

  • initial public release via reaktanz.de
